title: [GamePlay] Irelia´s Old Skin Shows Up
body: Dear Riot, I´ve find out a bug that Irelias old skin shows up when her w activates.. When you play and activate your w her "Old Skin" Show up.. Maybe it is fixed already but just that you know... (Srry if my english was bad)

replies.body:
Hiya hannayining! 

Thanks for your report! This is a known issue and should be fixed shortly!
